content.description: From crimps at face level, move out to the cool slopey pinch feature, then continue out right on seam crimps to the obvious incut pocket, then up to the finish rail. Hang & drop.
content.location: To the right of bass assassin on the face described as the "hang and drop" project wall in the guidebook. The start crimps are directly below the right side of the pinch feature.

content.description: Begin with your hands matched on small edges. Once set, throw out big to the right for a blocky pinch. Top out from there.
content.location: To the right of Desperado in near the center of the boulder.

content.description: low start to Smitty’s House that add one HARD move.begin on your choice of the 2 obvious iron edges under the low roof. The “potato chip” and the “L”.the First Ascentionist began matched on the “L” shaped edge and only used the “potato chip” as a high foot. But it’s fair game to start hands on both if you want.    Bring ample torque...
content.location:
The low start to Smitty’s House. Adds one nails hard move to Smitty’s House.

 Described as a “sit start on iron edges” in the Sandsone Warrior Guidebook.In reality it’s not a true Sit start, merely a crouched low start since the ground is too low to actually sit (unless your torso is 5 feet long).There are 2 obvious iron edges under the low roof a couple feet right of the start of Smitty’s House. The one farther back is like a potato chip, the one farther out is shaped like an “L”.I began matched on the “L” shaped edge and only used the “potato chip” as a high foot. But if any suitors want to start hands on both iron edges, then I consider that fair game. It’s a hard move either way...

content.description: Start on 2 crimps about 4 feet left of the start of Touch Of Nature.Start crimps are below the LEFT side of the cool slopey pinch rail feature (and they are bomber, unlike the flexing start holds on Touch Of Nature)Move up into the cool slopey pinch rail and continue rightwards to finish the same as Touch Of Nature.
content.protection: 4 at least. There’s a bit of a talus landing. I had 4 pads and no spot and it was a very heady trip.
content.location: 2 crimps 4 feet left of the start of Touch Of Nature.

content.description: Start with left hand on side pull, right on slopy edge. fire to the crimp, then shoot for the jug.

Sit start with matched hands on a big sloppy pinch pocket. Throw out to a pinch on the arete. Pull yourself around the arete. The problem ends when you stand up on the face to the left of the arete. Good problem.
content.location: Follow the directions posted on the mountain project page and they will lead you directly to this problem.

content.description: Cool boulder boasting some hard lines. Come prepared to give them some TLC before bouldering.
